description: Split text into semantically meaningful chunks using semantic similarity.

data_inputs.info: List of Data objects containing text and metadata to split.

embeddings.info: Embeddings model to use for semantic similarity. Required.

breakpoint_threshold_type.info: Method to determine breakpoints. Options: 'percentile', 'standard_deviation', 'interquartile'. Defaults to 'percentile'.

breakpoint_threshold_amount.info: Numerical amount for the breakpoint threshold.

number_of_chunks.info: Number of chunks to split the text into.

sentence_split_regex.info: Regular expression to split sentences. Optional.
